comment: Induction step in ~ fusgrfis : In a finite simple graph, the number of edges is finite if the number of edges not containing one of the vertices is finite. (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 5-Jan-2018.) (Revised by AV, 23-Oct-2020.)
